posts.post_content:
I won this [URL="http://www.sterlingsportsauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=17148"]Joss Pitching El Principe de Gales PSA 1[/URL] in the last Sterling auction.  I ended up getting another recently, so this one is available.  I'd prefer to trade it for another EPDG HOF, or a couple of commons.  Would consider selling as well.

(images from Sterling)
[IMG]http://www.sterlingsportsauctions.com/ItemImages/000017/17148a_lg.jpeg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.sterlingsportsauctions.com/ItemImages/000017/17148b_lg.jpeg[/IMG]

addie arrived in the mail today. i am very happy with the card and transaction, and i would certainly conduct business with this seller again.

thank you t206hound, and thank you net54!

Derek
I'll add to that - Erick is great!
